short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Source candidates to your Hirex account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your Hiring with Hirex Sourcing.

Source candidates directly into your Hirex account with just one click.

This extension allows you to add candidates in job boards to your job pipelines. You can add them to specific jobs and adding personal notes right away.

Our intuitive extension ensures you never have to leave your current page, making your sourcing smooth and straightforward. Plus, all candidate details, including the source page, are neatly organized in your Hirex account, making teamwork a breeze.

Quick, efficient, and seamless â€” transform your recruitment flow with Hirex Sourcing.
